name: 3 Guns Dead
description:
Out here, things get weirder the closer you get to the Spoil. Still, a person's got to stake their claim even if all of Hell and Earth comes to say otherwise.

***

3 Guns Dead is a fun and different kind of card game.

Battle against an AI or against players online in a unique struggle designed to test your memory and tactical thinking.

FEATURES

• Casual, yet tactical, card battles
• Unique “open information” mechanic inspired by Three-Card Monte
• Offline play against AI
• Online player versus player matches! (coming soon)
• Two game modes allow for shorter or longer matches
• Gain new cards by poaching them from defeated opponents, not by spending money
• Matches last 10 minutes or less
• Gritty Western art style
